metrics_conclusion: Doofenshmirtz Evil Inc Jingle has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion:
Doofenshmirtz Evil Inc Jingle is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music.
